summary: This bill amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to provide additional resources and data collection focused on English learners. Key provisions include requiring statistics on teacher diversity, updating the purposes of English language acquisition programs, and expanding authorized activities for subgrantees to include legal, educational, financial resources and social services, culturally competent training, and policy advocacy. The bill also modifies accountability and administration requirements to include data disaggregation by ethnicity, race, and native language.
